body.p: In Annual Improvements 2009–2011 Cycle (issued in May 2012) the Board addressed a request to clarify the requirements for providing comparative information for:

li.p: the comparative requirements for the opening statement of financial position when an entity changes accounting policies, or makes retrospective restatements or reclassifications, in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors; and
the requirements for providing comparative information when an entity provides financial statements beyond the minimum comparative information requirements.
